DOC.brief_title: Chewing Children With Repaired Esophageal Atresia-tracheoesophageal Fistula
DOC.detailed_description: The diet child normal feed skill include combination liquid , semisolid and/or solid food . Chewing dysfunction ( CD ) child may cause restriction solid food intake , thereby may result insufficient food intake delay growth . It aim evaluate chewing function child repair esophageal atresia-tracheoesophageal fistula ( EA-TEF ) . Patients repair EA-TEF evaluated age , sex , type atresia . Each child require bite chew standardize biscuit . Chewing function score Karaduman Chewing Performance Scale ( KCPS ) . The International Dysphagia Diet Standardisation Initiative ( IDDSI ) use determine tolerate food texture child .
